overview: Joey (Scheina) is a big Hollywood action star and a martial arts champ.  When he gets invited to be a celebrity judge at friend and mobster Molnar's (Jones) request he falls for Molnar's Number One Girl.  She is strictly off limits and so Joey must engage in a duel to the death with Molnar and his five bodyguards.

production_companies.name: Frame Werk Produktion GmbH & Co. KG

title: The Number One Girl
